fixes.name: Count ciudad de residencia
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced Tableau COUNTD with DAX DISTINCTCOUNT. Implemented the FIXED [Identificacion] LOD by calculating the distinct count while removing all filters except 'Identificacion' using ALLEXCEPT, producing the distinct count of 'Ciudad residencia' per 'Identificacion'.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The Tableau expression uses a FIXED LOD ({ FIXED ... }), which is an aggregation scoped independently of the view context, so it should be created as a measure.
